item.title: State poised to lead India’s quantum technology push: Raichur MP
item.description:
<![CDATA[Bengaluru: Karnataka is ready to play a leading role in shaping India’s quantum technology land-scape, Raichur MP G. Kumar Naik told the Lok Sabha on Monday while welcoming the Centre’s decision to invest in the National Quantum Mission (NQM).
Speaking under Rule 377, Naik stressed the need for better coordination, a clear im-plementation roadmap, and cooperative federalism to ensure that the mission delivers measurable outcomes. Drawing lessons from India’s semiconductor programme, he warned a...]]>
item.author: The Hans India
